content:
hey t-infra :wave:

I believe we recently lost our CI on https://github.com/rust-lang/polonius, and https://travis-ci.com/github/rust-lang/polonius mentions needing to be an admin to re-enable it.

I assume this is due to Travis shutting down the .org and moving to the .com ?

Is that a signal to instead switch this repo to use GHA ?
I will look into that then, thank you
opened the PR https://github.com/rust-lang/polonius/pull/164 -- I've never used GHA but have tested this a bit on my fork and PRs seemed to work OK
I'm more hesitant about the book job, using the simpleinfra actions, as I can't see whether the existing tokens would still work to upload the book
the upload looks good, CI is back, thanks for the help @simulacrum
